website_summaries.verdict: Between its high level of articulation, flexible stand, and attention to detail, this awesomely designed action figure is the best Gaara to oppose or befriend your Naruto toys.
pros: Includes 4 swappable hands, 2 faces, creepy sand hand, gourd, and figure stand
Easy to set in extremely cool poses

customer_reviews.title: These figures are amazing, pricey but you definately get what you pay ...
customer_reviews.text: These figures are amazing, pricey but you definitely get what you pay for, parts are sturdy and high quality, i recommend to any Naruto fan.
customer_reviews.author: SoNaR_54

customer_reviews.title: Anime must
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than excepted. Kinda expensive and I brought 2 by accident. My fault not sellers. Good piece
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Merriam

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sand ninja.
customer_reviews.text: Gaara is a very clean figure not much on leg movement but that’s also expect from from the show (insert laugh) but seriously this figure is great life like and accessories wonderful dynamic.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great toy but the toy was a bit hard to play with it is not for small children because it is expensive and it is a colectable if not 13 or older probably not a good idea to give to a child anyway good figure
customer_reviews.author: Julian Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Solid figure, detail could use work, hard to stand up.
customer_reviews.text: This figure is pretty great in my opinion his paint job could be more detailed but everything else is solid. His legs are a little hard to pose due to his clothes and he has a hard time standing up when his sand gourd is attached. Over all he's a super solid figure.
customer_reviews.author: @Operationgeek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Figures, amazing details and really great addition for the Naruto s.h. collection :)
customer_reviews.author: Patronus

customer_reviews.title: Gaara Action Figure Good!
customer_reviews.text: Really good action figure, I liked his faces I liked everything about it. I just wish that the face where it shows a crack of sand on his face for that one to be a mad face. It’s really good though!
customer_reviews.author: Naruto Fan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the bucks
customer_reviews.text: It cams built and you can just exchange the face expressions and designs and arms. My son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Ieasha McNac

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Decent figure, little less posability than I would have liked, and there is no feet pegs for the stand.
customer_reviews.author: kayla herbert

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It came sooner then the expected delivery time, and my son is in love with it.

product_meta.title: TAMASHII NATIONS Bandai S.H.Figuarts Gaara Naruto Shippuden Action Figure
product_meta.description: The ever popular S.H.Figuarts Naruto series continues with the long awaited favorite, Gaara. It wouldn't be an S.H.Figuarts Gaara if he didn't come with Gaara's gourd for carrying his supply of chakra-infused sand. But the star of the set is the large sand effect in the shape of a powerful clawed hand. In all, set includes interchangeable hands (x4), interchangeable face parts (x2), folded arm part, sand effect, and stand, and gourd. Look for origin of shipment: Only items shipped from within North America are being sold by authorized U.S. Retailers. The product box will have a Bluefin / Bandai Namco warning label, which is proof that you are purchasing an officially licensed Bandai product, distributed by its sole and authorized distributor (Bluefin ) for the U.S. Markets. This product has been thoroughly tested for safety and meets all North American consumer product safety regulations. The affixed label also entitles the purchaser to product support assistance within the United States.
feature_bullets: In all, set includes interchangeable hands (x4), interchangeable face parts (x2), folded arm Part, sand effect, and stand, and gourd
But the Star of the set is the large sand effect in the shape of a powerful clawed hand
